titleStmt.title: A treatise of English particles shewing how to render them according to the proprietie and elegance of the Latin : with A praxis upon the same : whereunto is affix't Idiomatologiae Anglo-Latine specimen, or, A taste of an English-Latine phraseologie ... / by W.W.
titleStmt.author: Walker, William, 1623-1684.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R & W for T. Garthwait,

notesStmt.note: "A praxis upon the foregoing treatise of particles" has separate paging; "Idiomatologiae Anglo-Latinae specimen" has separate t.p. and paging.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
